mapper.select: select uID, uName, uPwd, uSex, uBirth, uCity, uPhone, uEmail, uQQ, uCredit, uRegTime, uImage from shop.users where uID = #{uid}
select uID, uName, uPwd, uSex, uBirth, uCity, uPhone, uEmail, uQQ, uCredit, uRegTime, uImage from shop.users limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into shop.users(uName, uPwd, uSex, uBirth, uCity, uPhone, uEmail, uQQ, uCredit, uRegTime, uImage) values (#{uname}, #{upwd}, #{usex}, #{ubirth}, #{ucity}, #{uphone}, #{uemail}, #{uqq}, #{ucredit}, #{uregtime}, #{uimage})

insert into shop.users(uName, uPwd, uSex, uBirth, uCity, uPhone, uEmail, uQQ, uCredit, uRegTime, uImage) values
(#{entity.uname}, #{entity.upwd}, #{entity.usex}, #{entity.ubirth}, #{entity.ucity}, #{entity.uphone}, #{entity.uemail}, #{entity.uqq}, #{entity.ucredit}, #{entity.uregtime}, #{entity.uimage})

insert into shop.users(uName, uPwd, uSex, uBirth, uCity, uPhone, uEmail, uQQ, uCredit, uRegTime, uImage) values
(#{entity.uname}, #{entity.upwd}, #{entity.usex}, #{entity.ubirth}, #{entity.ucity}, #{entity.uphone}, #{entity.uemail}, #{entity.uqq}, #{entity.ucredit}, #{entity.uregtime}, #{entity.uimage})
on duplicate key update uName = values(uName) , uPwd = values(uPwd) , uSex = values(uSex) , uBirth = values(uBirth) , uCity = values(uCity) , uPhone = values(uPhone) , uEmail = values(uEmail) , uQQ = values(uQQ) , uCredit = values(uCredit) , uRegTime = values(uRegTime) , uImage = values(uImage)
mapper.update:
update shop.users
uName = #{uname},
uPwd = #{upwd},
uSex = #{usex},
uBirth = #{ubirth},
uCity = #{ucity},
uPhone = #{uphone},
uEmail = #{uemail},
uQQ = #{uqq},
uCredit = #{ucredit},
uRegTime = #{uregtime},
uImage = #{uimage},
where uID = #{uid}
